items.content_html: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.
items.title: rgbbeard/javascript: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.

items.content_html: Container-images is a lightweight library (0.6KB gzipped) which allows you to use container queries for images.
items.title: felixranesberger/container-images: Container-images is a lightweight library (0.6KB gzipped) which allows you to use container queries for images.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Online playground for lightweight HTML5 games and animations using the litecanvas engine.

items.content_html: Lightweight HTML5 canvas engine suitable for small games and animations.
items.title: litecanvas/engine: Lightweight HTML5 canvas engine suitable for small games and animations.

items.content_html: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
items.title: telegramsjs/Telegramsjs: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
